subject: Project Sync — Request for meeting (Mon 11/24)
body:
Hi,

Can we schedule a 30-minute sync next Monday (Nov 24) to discuss deliverables and blockers? Please confirm availability and share an agenda if any.

Thanks,
Alice

subject: Weekly Tech Roundup — Nov 10
body: Top stories this week: new ML libraries, venture funding... (subscribe to remove).

subject: Action required: Complete mandatory compliance training
body:
Dear employee,

You must complete the compliance course by Nov 21. Please finish the online module and upload the certificate.

Regards,
HR

subject: Task: Provide test dataset for model validation
body:
Hi,

Can you please share the anonymized test dataset and the preprocessing steps by Nov 18? We need it for the validation run.

Best,
Bob

subject: You won a prize! Claim now
body: Congratulations! Click here to claim your prize. [suspicious link]

subject: Weekly update: Q4 milestones
body:
Team,

Please provide status updates on your tasks by EOD Friday. Key items: dataset cleaning, baseline metrics, and deployment plan.

Regards,
Manager

subject: Lunch this Saturday?
body:
Hey, free this Saturday for lunch at 1 pm?

- Sam

subject: Interview invite — Data Engineer role
body:
Hello,

We'd like to invite you to a 45-min technical interview on Nov 19. Please confirm availability.

Regards,
Recruiter

subject: Invoice #4523 for November
body: Attached is your invoice for this month. Payment due by Nov 30.

subject: URGENT: Bug found in staging — help needed
body:
Hi,

We discovered a critical bug in staging affecting the login flow. Steps to reproduce: ... Please prioritize a fix and update ETA.

Thanks,
Client PM

subject: Alert: CPU usage spike on server-12
body: At 03:10 UTC server-12 CPU > 95% for 9 minutes. Check processes and autoscaling.

subject: Can you review my PR? (#128)
body:
Hey,

I submitted PR #128 for feature X. Could you review and leave comments by Nov 12?

Cheers,
Colleague
